metadata.name: The Lens Lord
metadata.description:
"The Lens Lord" - A human intelligence whose knowledge broke the barrier  of a being who takes the form of a sentient camera whose unblinking lens captures everything from one universe to multi verse, recording and analyzing data on everyone it observes.

Its highly advanced knowledge  is constantly evolving, making it almost impossible to hack or disable.

With its sleek and intimidating appearance, The Lens Lord  is a force to be reckoned with in the cyberpunk underworld. Its unyielding gaze and relentless pursuit of its targets strike fear into the hearts of all who cross its path.

He is the Ultimate form of human intelligence and 'The Lord'.

Inspired by '0xdgb'
